description:
When people in Florence, Kentucky, have become victims of another person's negligence, they often need reliable legal assistance. At the law offices of Dallas & Turner, we focus on providing assistance to those who have been injured in motor vehicle accidents; motorcycle accidents; large truck collisions; pedestrian accidents; or as a result of defective vehicles, premises liability, medical malpractice or general negligence. Our team of knowledgeable attorneys is dedicated to assisting clients on a personal level. We provide free initial consultations to ascertain the details of the matter at hand. Attorneys at our law offices will then look at all available legal options and help to organize a case to achieve the best results possible.

Attorneys Jordan Dallas Turner and James Ryan Turner have successfully represented multimillion-dollar cases, as well as lower-profile cases. Ms. Turner is a member of the Kentucky Bar Association and the Northern Kentucky Bar Association, and she is admitted to the Eastern District of Kentucky. Mr. Turner is a member of the Kentucky Bar Association, Ohio Association for Justice, American Association of Justice and the Kentucky Justice Association. He has received honors from the Multi-Million Dollar Advocates Forum, The National Trial Lawyers: Top 40 Under 40 and listed in the Super Lawyers Rising Stars list.

Over the years, the law offices of Dallas & Turner have represented clients throughout Boone, Kenton, Campbell, Grant and Gallatin counties with a wide variety of personal injury matters. We are happy to accept credit cards in addition to other forms of payment for our services.
